Class_Skill_Desc_Abdomen Tear: Delivers an attack with a potency of 240.</br>Can only be executed when Ready to Tear.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_Arm's Length: Creates a barrier nullifying most knockback and draw-in effects.</br>Duration: 6s</br>Additional Effect: Slow +20% when barrier is struck</br>Duration: 15s
Class_Skill_Desc_Aurora: Grants Regen to target.</br>Cure Potency: 200</br>Duration: 18s</br>Maximum Charges: 2//
Class_Skill_Desc_Blasting Zone: Delivers an attack with a potency of 720.
Class_Skill_Desc_Bloodfest: Draws aetheric energy from target, adding 3 Cartridges to your Powder Gauge.
Class_Skill_Desc_Bow Shock: Delivers an attack with a potency of 150 to all nearby enemies.</br>Additional Effect: Damage over time</br>Potency: 60</br>Duration: 15s
Class_Skill_Desc_Brutal Shell: Delivers an attack with a potency of 160.</br>Combo Action: Keen Edge</br>Combo Potency: 300</br>Combo Bonus: Restores own HP</br>Cure Potency: 200</br>Combo Bonus: Creates a barrier which nullifies damage equaling HP restored</br>Duration: 30s//
Class_Skill_Desc_Burst Strike: Delivers an attack with a potency of 380.</br>Additional Effect: Grants Ready to Blast</br>Duration: 10s</br>Effect of Ready to Blast ends upon execution of any weaponskill.</br>//Cartridge Cost: 1
Class_Skill_Desc_Camouflage: Increases parry rate by 50% while reducing damage taken by 10%.</br>Duration: 20s
Class_Skill_Desc_Continuation: Allows the firing of successive rounds with your gunblade.</br>Gnashing Fang may be followed by Jugular Rip.</br>Savage Claw may be followed by Abdomen Tear.</br>Wicked Talon may be followed by Eye Gouge.</br>Burst Strike may be followed by Hypervelocity.
Class_Skill_Desc_Danger Zone: Delivers an attack with a potency of 250.
Class_Skill_Desc_Demon Slaughter: Delivers an attack with a potency of 100 to all nearby enemies.</br>Combo Action: Demon Slice</br>Combo Potency: 160</br>Combo Bonus: Adds a Cartridge to your Powder Gauge
Class_Skill_Desc_Demon Slice: Delivers an attack with a potency of 100 to all nearby enemies.
Class_Skill_Desc_Double Down: Delivers an attack to all nearby enemies with a potency of 1,200 for the first enemy, and 15% less for all remaining enemies.</br>Cartridge Cost: 2</br>This weaponskill does not share a recast timer with any other actions.
Class_Skill_Desc_Eye Gouge: Delivers an attack with a potency of 280.</br>Can only be executed when Ready to Gouge.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_Fated Circle: Delivers an attack with a potency of 300 to all nearby enemies.</br>Cartridge Cost: 1
Class_Skill_Desc_Gnashing Fang: Delivers an attack with a potency of 380.</br>Additional Effect: Grants Ready to Rip</br>Duration: 10s</br>Effect of Ready to Rip ends upon execution of any weaponskill.</br>//Cartridge Cost: 1</br>This weaponskill does not share a recast timer with any other actions.
Class_Skill_Desc_Heart of Corundum: Reduces damage taken by target party member or self by 15%.</br>Duration: 8s</br>Additional Effect: When targeting a party member while under the effect of Brutal Shell, that effect is also granted to the target</br>Duration: 30s</br>Additional Effect: Grants Clarity of Corundum to target</br>Clarity of Corundum Effect: Reduces damage taken by 15%</br>Duration: 4s</br>Additional Effect: Grants Catharsis of Corundum to target</br>Catharsis of Corundum Effect: Restores HP when HP falls below 50% or upon effect duration expiration</br>Cure Potency: 900</br>Duration: 20s
Class_Skill_Desc_Heart of Light: Reduces magic damage taken by self and nearby party members by 10%.</br>Duration: 15s
Class_Skill_Desc_Heart of Stone: Reduces damage taken by a party member or self by 15%.</br>Duration: 7s</br>Additional Effect: When targeting a party member while under the effect of Brutal Shell, that effect is also granted to the target</br>Duration: 30s
Class_Skill_Desc_Hypervelocity: Delivers an attack with a potency of 180.</br>Can only be executed when Ready to Blast.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_Interject: Interrupts the use of a target's action.
Class_Skill_Desc_Jugular Rip: Delivers an attack with a potency of 200.</br>Can only be executed when Ready to Rip.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_Keen Edge: Delivers an attack with a potency of 200.
Class_Skill_Desc_Lightning Shot: Delivers a ranged attack with a potency of 150.</br>Additional Effect: Increased enmity
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Abdomen Tear: Delivers an attack with a potency of 2,000.</br>Junction Tank Bonus: Creates a barrier around self that absorbs damage equivalent to a heal of 5,000 potency</br>Duration: 7s</br>Junction DPS Bonus: Increases potency to 4,000</br>Junction Healer Bonus: Restores own HP and the HP of nearby party members within a radius of 15 yalms</br>Cure Potency: 3,000</br>Can only be executed when Ready to Tear.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Aurora: Restores own or target party member's HP.</br>Cure Potency: 12,000</br>Additional Effect: Regen</br>Cure Potency: 3,000</br>Duration: 12s</br>Can only be executed while under the effect of Junction Healer.</br>Shares a recast timer with Nebula and Blasting Zone.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Blasting Zone: Delivers an attack with a potency of 10,000.</br>Can only be executed while under the effect of Junction DPS.</br>Shares a recast timer with Nebula and Aurora.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Brutal Shell: Delivers an attack with a potency of 4,000.</br>Combo Action: Keen Edge</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Burst Strike: Delivers an attack with a potency of 7,000.</br>Additional Effect: Grants Ready to Blast</br>Duration: 10s</br>Can only be executed while under the effect of Powder Barrel.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Continuation: Allows the firing of successive rounds with your gunblade.</br>Gnashing Fang may be followed by Jugular Rip.</br>Savage Claw may be followed by Abdomen Tear.</br>Wicked Talon may be followed by Eye Gouge.</br>Burst Strike may be followed by Hypervelocity.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Double Down: Delivers an attack with a potency of 12,000 to all nearby enemies.</br>This weaponskill does not share a recast timer with any other actions.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Draw and Junction: Grants self a beneficial effect based on the selected party member or enemy.</br>If target is a DPS, grants Junction DPS.</br>If target is a tank, or if no target is selected, grants Junction Tank.</br>If target is a healer, grants Junction Healer.</br>Additional Effect: Grants Powder Barrel when targeting an enemy</br>Duration: 10s</br>※Solid Barrel Combo changes to Burst Strike while under the effect of Powder Barrel.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Eye Gouge: Delivers an attack with a potency of 3,000.</br>Junction Tank Bonus: Creates a barrier around self that absorbs damage equivalent to a heal of 6,000 potency</br>Duration: 7s</br>Junction DPS Bonus: Increases potency to 5,000</br>Junction Healer Bonus: Restores own HP and the HP of nearby party members within a radius of 15 yalms</br>Cure Potency: 4,000</br>Can only be executed when Ready to Gouge.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Gnashing Fang: Delivers an attack with a potency of 5,000.</br>Additional Effect: Grants Ready to Rip</br>Duration: 5s</br>This weaponskill does not share a recast timer with any other actions.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Hypervelocity: Delivers an attack with a potency of 3,000.</br>Junction Tank Bonus: Creates a barrier around self that absorbs damage equivalent to a heal of 6,000 potency</br>Duration: 7s</br>Junction DPS Bonus: Increases potency to 5,000</br>Junction Healer Bonus: Restores own HP and the HP of nearby party members within a radius of 15 yalms</br>Cure Potency: 4,000</br>Can only be executed when Ready to Blast.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Jugular Rip: Delivers an attack with a potency of 1,000.</br>Junction Tank Bonus: Creates a barrier around self that absorbs damage equivalent to a heal of 4,000 potency</br>Duration: 7s</br>Junction DPS Bonus: Increases potency to 3,000</br>Junction Healer Bonus: Restores own HP and the HP of nearby party members within a radius of 15 yalms</br>Cure Potency: 2,000</br>Can only be executed when Ready to Rip.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Junctioned Cast: Executes an action depending on your current Junction.</br>Junction DPS: Blasting Zone</br>Junction Tank: Nebula</br>Junction Healer: Aurora
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Keen Edge: Delivers an attack with a potency of 3,000.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Nebula: Reduces damage taken by 20% and delivers an attack with a potency of 4,000 every time you suffer damage.</br>Duration: 10s</br>Can only be executed while under the effect of Junction Tank.</br>Shares a recast timer with Blasting Zone and Aurora.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Relentless Rush: Unleashes a flurry of blade strikes on nearby enemies, dealing damage over time with a potency of 4,000 and reducing damage taken by 25% until effect expires.</br>Duration: 4s</br>Activates Terminal Trigger when effect duration expires.</br>Additional Effect: Afflicts target with Relentless Shrapnel, reducing damage dealt by 4% while increasing damage taken by 4% per stack</br>Duration: 5s</br>Maximum Stacks: 5</br>Can be executed while moving.</br>Can only be executed when the limit gauge is full.</br>Gauge Charge Time: 60s</br>※Action changes to Terminal Trigger upon execution.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Rough Divide: Rushes target and delivers an attack with a potency of 2,000.</br>Additional Effect: Grants No Mercy</br>No Mercy Effect: Increases damage dealt and healing potency by 20%, while also increasing movement speed by 25%</br>Duration: 7s</br>Maximum Charges: 2</br>Cannot be executed while bound.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Savage Claw: Delivers an attack with a potency of 6,000.</br>Combo Action: Gnashing Fang</br>Additional Effect: Grants Ready to Tear</br>Duration: 5s</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Solid Barrel: Delivers an attack with a potency of 5,000.</br>Combo Action: Brutal Shell</br>Additional Effect: Grants Powder Barrel</br>Duration: 10s</br>※Solid Barrel Combo changes to Burst Strike while under the effect of Powder Barrel.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Terminal Trigger: Delivers an attack with a potency of 12,000 to all nearby enemies.</br>Additional Effect: Stun</br>Duration: 3s</br>Can only be executed while under the effect of Relentless Rush.</br>Relentless Rush effect expires upon execution.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Wicked Talon: Delivers an attack with a potency of 7,000.</br>Combo Action: Savage Claw</br>Additional Effect: Grants Ready to Gouge</br>Duration: 5s</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_Provoke: Gesture threateningly, placing yourself at the top of a target's enmity list while gaining additional enmity.
Class_Skill_Desc_Release Royal Guard: Cancels the effect of Royal Guard.
Class_Skill_Desc_Reprisal: Reduces damage dealt by nearby enemies by 10%.</br>Duration: 10s
Class_Skill_Desc_Rough Divide: Delivers a jumping attack with a potency of 150.</br>Maximum Charges: 2</br>Cannot be executed while bound.
Class_Skill_Desc_Royal Guard: Significantly increases enmity generation.</br>Effect ends upon reuse.
Class_Skill_Desc_Savage Claw: Delivers an attack with a potency of 460.</br>Combo Action: Gnashing Fang</br>Combo Bonus: Grants Ready to Tear</br>Duration: 10s</br>Effect of Ready to Tear ends upon execution of any weaponskill.//</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_Shield Wall: Reduces damage taken by all party members by 20%.</br>Duration: 10s
Class_Skill_Desc_Shirk: Diverts 25% of enmity to target party member.
Class_Skill_Desc_Solid Barrel: Delivers an attack with a potency of 140.</br>Combo Action: Brutal Shell</br>Combo Potency: 360</br>Combo Bonus: Adds a Cartridge to your Powder Gauge//
Class_Skill_Desc_Sonic Break: Delivers an attack with a potency of 300.</br>Additional Effect: Damage over time</br>Potency: 60</br>Duration: 30s</br>This weaponskill does not share a recast timer with any other actions.
Class_Skill_Desc_Stronghold: Reduces damage taken by all party members by 40%.</br>Duration: 15s
Class_Skill_Desc_Superbolide: Reduces HP to 1 and renders you impervious to most attacks.</br>Duration: 10s
Class_Skill_Desc_Wicked Talon: Delivers an attack with a potency of 540.</br>Combo Action: Savage Claw</br>Combo Bonus: Grants Ready to Gouge</br>Duration: 10s</br>Effect of Ready to Gouge ends upon execution of any weaponskill.//</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Status_Desc_Abdomen Tear: A magicked barrier is nullifying damage.
Class_Status_Desc_Brutal Shell: A highly effective defensive maneuver is nullifying damage.
Class_Status_Desc_Camouflage: Parry rate is increased while damage taken is reduced.
Class_Status_Desc_Drained Fortitude: Damage dealt and potency of all HP restoration actions are reduced.
Class_Status_Desc_Eye Gouge: A magicked barrier is nullifying damage.
Class_Status_Desc_Hypervelocity: A magicked barrier is nullifying damage.
Class_Status_Desc_Jugular Rip: A magicked barrier is nullifying damage.
Class_Status_Desc_Lightning Shot: Next weaponskill will deal increased damage.
Class_Status_Desc_Nebula: Damage taken is reduced while countering any attacks.
Class_Status_Desc_No Mercy: Damage dealt and potency of HP restoration actions are increased. Movement speed is also increased.
Class_Status_Desc_Relentless Rush: Swinging blade wildly, dealing damage over time to nearby enemies and deflecting a portion of damage taken.
Class_Trait_Desc_Cartridge Charge: Stores a Cartridge in your Powder Gauge after successfully completing a combo with Solid Barrel.</br>Maximum Cartridges: 2
Class_Trait_Desc_Cartridge Charge II: Increases Powder Gauge capacity to 3 Cartridges.</br>Executing Bloodfest stores 3 Cartridges.
Class_Trait_Desc_Danger Zone Mastery: Upgrades Danger Zone to Blasting Zone.
Class_Trait_Desc_Enhanced Aurora: Allows the accumulation of charges for consecutive uses of Aurora.</br>Maximum Charges: 2
Class_Trait_Desc_Enhanced Brutal Shell: Grants the effect of Brutal Shell after successfully completing a combo with Brutal Shell.</br>Duration: 30s
Class_Trait_Desc_Enhanced Continuation: Become Ready to Blast after executing Burst Strike.</br>Duration: 10s
Class_Trait_Desc_Heart of Stone Mastery: Upgrades Heart of Stone to Heart of Corundum.
Class_Trait_Desc_Melee Mastery: Increases the potency of Keen Edge to 200, Brutal Shell to 160, and Solid Barrel to 140.
Class_Trait_Desc_Tank Mastery: Reduces damage taken by 20%. Furthermore, grants a bonus to maximum HP based on your vitality attribute, and a bonus to damage dealt based on your strength attribute.
